title: RockStar VA 270
subtitle: The most ambitious race ever conceived.
description: Recap of Cole Inman's start of the Rockstar VA, a 270 mile race from Harrisonburg to Roaonoke. Trail, Gravel, and Road options.
author: cole
keywords: roanoke, harrisonburg, race, ride, endurance, virginia endurance series, bikepacking, gravel, trail, road, pave, snow, ultra
